member.name: M:RptToXml.RptDefinitionReader.WriteToRpt(System.String)
member.summary: Saves the report-definition document to the specified file.
member.param: The location of the file where you want to save the document.

member.name: M:RptToXml.RptDefinitionWriter.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Use a report specified by file location

member.name: M:RptToXml.RptDefinitionWriter.WriteToXml(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Saves the report-definition document to the specified stream.
member.param: The stream to which you want to save.

member.name: M:RptToXml.RptDefinitionWriter.WriteToXml(System.String)
member.summary: Saves the report-definition document to the specified file.
member.param: The location of the file where you want to save the document.

member.name: M:RptToXml.RptDefinitionWriter.WriteToXml(System.Xml.XmlWriter@)
